ai-tika-vin09t5:164_2: The first cannot be construed to embracts, so what is the actions of action?”

ai-tika-vin09t5:167_0: all the roads to the storehouses, to the cows, and places them in the shaves,

ai-tika-vin09t5:170_0: “Paying, monk,” “Three,” he replied, “Tissa,” “These are the three truths.”
ai-tika-vin09t5:170_1: “One who has produced in the robe-making season for one like me is performing a demonstration of action.”
ai-tika-vin09t5:171_0: The training rule on entering an inhabited area at the wrong time is finished.

ai-tika-vin09t5:178_0: The training rule on covering with cotton down
ai-tika-vin09t5:179_0: even if he gets too far away, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-vin09t5:179_1: If she obtains it within a specific purpose and then uses it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-tika-vin09t5:180_0: The training rule on upholstered with cotton down is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t5:182_0: Although these monks sit down, they won’t because it is not shared by a robe given in the texts, nor even if they are to be understood that on account of the three robes, they should be understood as the aggregates of requisites.
ai-tika-vin09t5:182_1: “The rice field is not allowed to obtain a gaining material gains, even one that is unfavourable,” and they are said to be the shape of a neighbouring curry of rice.

ai-tika-vin09t5:184_0: The ninth sub-chapter on precious things is finished.
ai-tika-vin09t5:185_0: The purification of the mind is finished.
